Name: Star League Defense Force
Description: The Star League Defense Force (SLDF) was the principal military force defending the Star League, a conglomeration of star systems within roughly 500 light years of Terra. At its height the SLDF was the largest military force known to man, composed of over 100 million soldiers organized into 486 divisions. The Star League Defense Force left the Inner Sphere after fighting the Amaris Civil War, when Stefan Amaris overthrew the ruling First Lord of the Star League, Richard Cameron. After a long series of bloody battles throughout the Star League, Commanding General Aleksandr Kerensky ended the coup with the liberation of Terra and the execution of Amaris. However when no new First Lord could be agreed upon by the Great Houses the Star League was dissolved. Kerensky then led the surviving 113 divisions out beyond the Inner Sphere in Operation EXODUS, hoping to save the essence of the League from the internecine violence that was to come. The SLDF would return 300 years later as the Clans, a technologically superior military that invaded the Inner Sphere in 3049.
ReputationStatements: I don't know why we bother offering you contracts, to be perfectly honest. It's obvious you're not a friend to the Star League Defense Force. Regardless, we find ourselves in desperate times, so the wanna be warriors will have to do.
Greetings, mercenary. Though you are not of the same calibre the SLDF, you may yet serve our interests. Finish this job, and we may change our mind.
The Star League Defense Force has a use for mercenaries like you, Commander. I think you'll be interested in the attached contract. An agreement would be most beneficial.
The Star League Defense Force would like to offer you a prime contract, Commander. As the leader of a respected mercenary company, you should find the contract acceptable.
Commander, I hope this message finds you well. The Star League Defense Force would like to extend a contract to you, as you have proven your worth. Please consider it carefully.

Greetings, my friend. This contract is not one we would offer to a lesser mercenary, but you've proven your loyalty, prowess, and dedication to the ideals of the Star League Defense Force. I hope you'll accept our offer.

We both know the sitrep, Commander. The SLDF relies on you like you're one of our own, and you've always been there to help us out. I hope you can see fit to agree this time as well — this is a job too important for lesser warriors.
MissionSuccessStatements: Top-tier work, Commander — The SLDF is most pleased with your results. Keep it up, and I'll make sure a lot more work comes your way.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: The Star League Defense Force understands that sacrifice on the battlefield doesn't always translate to victory. You've made a valiant, yet ineffective effort. We trust you will do better for the next battle.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your performance was appalling, Commander. Your efforts on the battlefield warrant a demotion, and are not indicative of the leader of a reknowned mercenary company.
